committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Conservation and Power

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of master meters for gas and electricity supplied to new buildings having more than one unit, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Public Utility Regulatory Policies Act of 1978 to require separate metering of the electricity or natural gas used in each new building unit constructed after enactment of this Act. Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to bring actions against electric and gas utilities to require compliance with such requirements. Sets forth penalties for violations of such requirements.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of master meters for gas and electricity supplied to new buildings having more than one unit, and for other purposes.
